item.title: 西班牙桑切斯呼吁在大火肆虐之际制定国家气候公约
item.description: 西班牙多个地区野火肆虐，西班牙总统佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）呼吁在全国范围内联合各级政府，共同应对他所称的日益加剧的气候紧急状况。【原文：Spain’s Pedro Sanchez called for a nationwide pact uniting all levels of government to combat what he called an accelerating climate emergency as wildfires raged in several regions of the country.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦警告本月将有更多季风降雨和洪灾
item.description: 据政府官员称，巴基斯坦本月降雨量预计将增加，进一步引发洪水和山体滑坡的风险也将增大。【原文：Pakistan is expected to face increased rainfall this month, raising the risk of further flooding and landslides, according to government officials.】

item.title: 地铁和地下车库是尚未开发的地热能源来源
item.description: 今天的时事通讯将探讨一种意想不到的能源：停车场、地铁和其他人造地下空间。您可以在 Bloomberg.com 上阅读和分享本篇报道的完整版。如需无限制地获取气候和能源新闻，请订阅。【原文：Today’s newsletter explores an unexpected source of energy: parking garages, subways and other manmade underground spaces. You can read and share a full version of this story on Bloomberg.com. For unlimited access to climate and energy news, please subscribe.】

item.title: 一家初创公司正在利用地下停车场提供清洁能源
item.description:
在城市寻求利用零碳电力和供热的过程中，Enerdrape 为地热能源提供了一种新颖的免钻孔解决方案。【原文：

As cities look to harness zero-carbon power and heating, Enerdrape is offering a novel no-drill solution for geothermal energy.

item.title: 特朗普对风能和太阳能的最新攻击挤压了减税空间
item.description: 特朗普政府收紧了长期以来对清洁能源税收抵免的资格要求，此举可能威胁到数百个正在开发的风能和太阳能项目的可行性。【原文：The Trump administration tightened long-standing eligibility requirements for clean energy tax credits, a move that could threaten the viability of hundreds of wind and solar energy projects under development.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州就 2024 年野火对 Xcel 等公司展开调查
item.description: 得克萨斯州总检察长正在调查包括公用事业公司 Xcel Energy Inc.【原文：The Texas attorney general is investigating companies including utility Xcel Energy Inc. for wildfires that devastated the state last last year.】

item.title: 艾琳风暴在前往加勒比海的途中达到飓风强度
item.description: 艾琳已达到飓风强度，预计本周末在大西洋温暖海域翻腾时将增强威力。【原文：Erin has reached hurricane strength and is expected to gain power as it churns across a warm stretch of the Atlantic Ocean this weekend.】

item.title: 电动汽车快速充电器有一个令人惊讶的健康弊端
item.description:
保持冷却的风扇似乎会激起微粒物质，但有解决方法。【原文：

The fans that keep them cool appear to kick up particulate matter, but there are fixes.

】

item.title: 暴雨加剧，芝加哥启动洪水预警系统
item.description:
Verizon和初创公司Hyfi与该市合作建立了一个传感器网络，该网络将在洪水发生时检测到洪水。【原文：

Verizon and startup Hyfi partnered with the city on a network of sensors that will detect flooding as it happens. 

】

item.title: 英国金融监管委员会称，ESG 贷款市场已不受 "洗绿 "影响
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）在警告与可持续发展挂钩的贷款市场存在 "洗绿 "风险两年后表示，银行和借款人似乎已经做出了有意义的改进。【原文：Two years after it warned of greenwashing risks in the market for sustainability-linked loans, the UK’s Financial Conduct Authority says banks and borrowers appear to have made meaningful improvements.】

item.title: 强硬立场 "阻碍协议达成，全球塑料谈判失败
item.description:
试图就塑料污染问题达成全球协议的努力最终未能达成共识 

Attempts to reach a global accord on plastic pollution ended without consensus 

】

item.title: 赞比亚保证矿山污染泄漏后的公共用水安全
item.description: 赞比亚政府试图平息公众对污染水平的担忧，因为一项研究发现，今年 2 月中国国有铜矿灾难造成的损失远大于官方报告的数字。【原文：The Zambian government sought to calm public concerns about pollution levels after a study found that the damage done by a disaster at a Chinese state-owned copper mine in February was much larger than officially reported.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦暴雨引发山洪造成至少 49 人死亡
item.description: 巴基斯坦贝沙哈尔（美联社）— 官员们周五表示，暴雨引发的山洪在过去24小时内造成巴基斯坦西北部和其他地区至少49人死亡，救援人员从一个遭受山体滑坡袭击的山区疏散了1300名受困游客。【原文：PESHAWAR, Pakistan (AP) — Flash floods triggered by heavy rains killed at least 49 people in northwestern Pakistan and elsewhere in the country over the past 24 hours, officials said Friday, as rescuers evacuated 1,300 stranded tourists from a mountainous district hit by landslides.】

item.title: Orsted 因美国海上风电市场风险被 S&P 下调评级
item.description: Orsted A/S被S&P全球评级公司下调至投资级的最低级别，原因是随着特朗普政府停止该行业的发展，Orsted A/S的美国海上风电业务面临越来越大的风险。【原文：Orsted A/S was downgraded to the lowest tier of investment grade by S&P Global Ratings on increasing risks to its US offshore wind business as the Trump Administration moves to halt the sector’s development.】

item.title: 大气河威胁淹没美国西北部并打破纪录
item.description: 本周，一条可能破纪录的大气河流将从太平洋上席卷而来，浸泡美国西北部和邻近的不列颠哥伦比亚省。【原文：A potentially record-breaking atmospheric river will sweep off the Pacific Ocean this week, soaking the US Northwest and neighboring British Columbia.】

item.title: 拉尼娜现象几率上升预示大西洋将出现更多飓风
item.description: 全球可能即将转入拉尼娜天气模式，随着大西洋飓风季节高峰期的临近，这种发展态势将增加大西洋风暴的风险。【原文：The world may be about to shift into a La Niña weather pattern, a development that would increase the risk of storms in the Atlantic as the height of hurricane season approaches there.】

item.title: 英国电池开发商旨在为欧洲扩张筹集数百万美元资金
item.description: 英国电池开发商和谐能源有限公司（Harmony Energy Ltd.）正计划进行融资，以进军欧洲新市场。【原文：UK battery developer Harmony Energy Ltd. is planning a capital raise as it pushes into new markets in Europe, where surging wind and solar are straining grids and boosting demand for storage.】

item.title: VinFast 将与创始人达成 15 亿美元交易，分拆研发资产
item.description: 越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast Auto Ltd. 宣布，计划将其研发部门的一部分分拆到一家新成立的公司，然后在一项价值约 15 亿美元的交易中出售给该汽车制造商的创始人。【原文：Vietnamese electric vehicle maker VinFast Auto Ltd. announced plans to spin off part of its research and development unit into a newly formed company, which will then be sold to the automaker’s founder in a deal worth about $1.5 billion, according to a filing.】

item.title: 热浪减弱，希腊和西班牙仍发生致命火灾
item.description: 希腊和西班牙发生致命大火，迫使数千居民和游客撤离。【原文：Firefighters worked overnight to contain deadly blazes in Greece and Spain that have forced the evacuation of thousands of residents and tourists.】

item.title: 特朗普财政部将决定数百个风能和太阳能项目的命运
item.description:
下周发布的税收指南威胁着全美项目的财务可行性。【原文：

Tax guidance due next week threatens the financial viability of projects across the US.

】

item.title: 缩小反应堆和发展核能的竞赛
item.description:
西方国家何时开始建造小型模块化反应堆？核科学家、风险投资公司 DCVC 合伙人雷切尔-斯莱博（Rachel Slaybaugh）将与《零点》杂志共同探讨这一问题。【原文：

When will Western countries start building small modular reactors? Rachel Slaybaugh, nuclear scientist and partner at venture capital firm DCVC, joins Zero to discuss.

】

item.title: 波杜尔掠过香港，香港扩大降雨警告范围，降雨量创历史新高
item.description: 热带风暴 "波杜 "经过香港时，香港的中央商务区和外围机场受到狂风和暴雨的袭击，香港再次发出最高降雨量警告。【原文：Hong Kong’s central business district and outer airport were hit by violent gusts and a deluge of heavy rainfall, with the city again issuing its highest rain warning as Tropical Storm Podul passed the region.】

item.title: 卢拉为亚马逊地区 COP30 制定的计划有可能成为后勤混乱之虞
item.description: 今年的联合国气候峰会定于 11 月在巴西举行，旨在将世界各国领导人、外交官和大约 5 万名其他与会者带到亚马逊雨林的中心地带，从而创造历史。现在，这场盛会越来越有可能被一场迫在眉睫的后勤灾难所决定。【原文：This year’s United Nations climate summit, scheduled for November in Brazil, has been designed to make history by bringing world leaders, diplomats and some 50,000 other participants into the heart of the Amazon rain forest. Now the event increasingly risks being defined by a looming logistical fiasco.】

item.title: 南非法院暂停批准道达尔能源公司的石油区块
item.description: 南非一家法院推翻了授予道达尔能源 SE 公司在该国西海岸近海石油勘探区块的环境授权的决定。【原文：A South African court overturned a decision granting TotalEnergies SE environmental authorization for an oil exploration block offshore the country’s west coast.】

item.title: 银行业濒危气候联盟在欧洲失势
item.description:
一场始于华尔街的大逃亡正在大西洋两岸蔓延，威胁着世界上最大的银行气候联盟的未来。【原文：

An exodus that started on Wall Street is now spreading across the Atlantic, threatening the future of the world’s largest climate alliance for banks.

】

item.title: 英国风力发电量下滑，酷热天气带来可再生能源风险
item.description: 本周，英国的风力涡轮机几乎停转，因为又一波热浪带来了平静的天气，迫使英国转用天然气发电。【原文：Britain’s wind turbines ground to a near halt this week, as another heat wave brought calm conditions and forced the nation to switch to gas for power generation.】

item.title: 热浪袭来，欧洲终于用上了空调
item.description: 当欧洲汗流浃背地度过又一个气温创历史新高的夏天时，欧洲大陆的大部分地区正在经历一场迅速而又往往紧张的变革。【原文：As Europe sweats through another summer of record-high temperatures, much of the continent is undergoing a rapid and often tense transformation.】

item.title: 大火迫使希腊海滩居民撤离，农作物遭受高温袭击
item.description: 希腊海岸警卫队的船只疏散了游客和当地居民，而在西班牙，一名志愿消防员在当局努力扑灭地中海各地的大火时丧生。【原文：Greek coastguard vessels evacuated tourists and locals, while a volunteer firefighter died in Spain as authorities struggled to quell blazes across the Mediterranean.】

item.title: 台风 "波杜 "袭击台湾南部，带来暴雨
item.description: 台风 "波杜 "在台湾东南沿海登陆，带来暴雨和强风，预计将于周三穿过台湾岛，然后向中国大陆进发。【原文：Typhoon Podul made landfall on Taiwan’s southeastern coast, bringing torrential rains and strong winds, and is forecast to track across the island on Wednesday before heading toward mainland China.】

item.description: 三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. is in talks with a number of governments as it seeks to build a pipeline of swaps to help developing nations refinance debt and free up funds for social and infrastructure projects.】
